file_insights.changes: Added import for GanttTimelinePage component and new route configuration

patterns_discovered.description: Timeline route added as nested route under projects/:projectId, following established pattern of other project sub-routes (contacts, inspections, rfis)
New page import added in alphabetical order with other page imports at top of file
Each feature has dedicated page component imported and routed independently

gotchas_discovered.description: Route uses 'timeline' as path, not the full '/projects/:projectId/timeline' - relies on parent route nesting for full path construction
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Standard React Router v6 nested routing pattern

approach_outcome.description: Successfully added timeline route by: (1) importing GanttTimelinePage component, (2) adding Route element within projects/:projectId nested route structure, (3) following existing code patterns for consistency

recommendations.recommendation: Ensure GanttTimelinePage component exists at specified path before deployment to prevent runtime errors
Verify timeline route navigation works correctly from project pages and that authentication/protected route logic applies to new route
Document timeline feature in project routing documentation if maintained
